content: The "Gucci Guilty Pour Homme Eau de Parfum" fragrance is described as a Woody Aromatic Spicy scent, with top notes of Rose and Chili Pepper that create an unexpected and invigorating retro vibe. The heart of the fragrance features Orange Blossom Absolute, Neroli, and French Lavender, which give it a stronger, more masculine statement. The base of the fragrance is rich and sensual, with notes of Patchouli and Cedarwood. The overall impression of the fragrance is one of suggestiveness and surprise, with its unexpected combination of ingredients and its focus on creating a bold, masculine statement.
